titleStmt.title: Hydriotaphia, urn-burial, or, A discours of the sepulchral urns lately found in Norfolk together with the Garden of Cyrus, or, The quincuncial lozenge, or network of plantations of the ancients, artificially, naturally, mystically considered : with sundry observations / by Thomas Browne.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Thomas, Sir, 1605-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
